title: Banana and chocolate chip muffins
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '200 g (7 oz) peeled bananas, coarsely chopped', '1 whole egg plus 2 egg whites', '250 ml (9 fl oz) skimmed milk', '400 g (14 oz) self-raising white flour', '150 g (5½ oz) caster sugar or soft light brown sugar', '½ teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons finely grated orange zest', '50 g (1¾ oz) dark chocolate with 70 per cent cocoa solids, finely chopped']
